name: uppy
description: Almost as cute as a Puppy :dog:

scripts.build:js: npm run build:lib && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:bundle:min
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:bundle:min && npm run build:css
scripts.docs: cd website && node node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js readme ../src/index.js --readme-file=src/api/docs.md --section 'Uppy Core & Plugins' -q --github -c doc-order.json
scripts.lint:fix: eslint src test website/build-examples.js website/update.js website/themes/uppy/source/js/common.js --fix
scripts.lint: eslint src test website/build-examples.js website/update.js website/themes/uppy/source/js/common.js
scripts.release: npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.start: parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run start:server' 'npm run web:preview'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.watch:css: nodemon --watch src --ext scss -x 'npm run build:css && node website/update.js'
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --watch src --ext js -x 'npm run build:bundle && node website/update.js'
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' && node website/update.js
scripts.web:build: cd website && node update.js && ./node_modules/.bin/hexo generate --silent && node build-examples.js
scripts.web:deploy: npm run web:install && npm run web:disc && npm run docs && npm run web:build && ./bin/web-deploy
scripts.web:disc:
npm run build:bundle:fullpath && discify dist/uppy-fp.js --output website/src/_disc.html && echo '---
layout: false
---
' |cat - website/src/_disc.html > website/src/disc.html && rm website/src/_disc.html
scripts.web:preview: cd website && parallelshell 'node build-examples.js watch' './node_modules/.bin/hexo server'
scripts.web: npm run web:clean && npm run web:build
